title: Creating a Bar Graph
body: The columns in the provided table contain: the race or ethnicity of students in U.S. Public Schools for the class of $$2011$$, percentages for the Advanced Placement examine population for that class, and percentages for the overall student population.\n##figure2.gif
lesson: 2.2 Stem-and-Leaf Graphs (Stemplots), Line Graphs, and Bar Graphs
